item.title: Globalization is not a politically antiseptic process
item.description:
Does Russia’s invasion of Ukraine indicate that the world has entered a new era of great-power rivalry and, potentially, conflict? Vladimir Putin’s stunning decisions to attack Ukraine, and the apparent blessing that he received from a Chinese government that also has designs on its neighbors, initially felt like a deeply ominous thing. But the difficul…

item.title: The Apple-TSMC Partnership
item.description:
The TSMC-Apple partnership has been one of the defining relationships of the mobile computing era. Without Apple as a predictable, high volume and demanding customer, it is unlikely that TSMC would have been able to catch up to Intel on advanced node semiconductor manufacturing. Similarly, without the support of the TSMC ecosystem, it is unlikely that A…

URL: https://semiconductor.substack.com/p/the-apple-tsmc-partnership?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

item.title: Interview: Andrew Gelman, statistician
item.description:
The past few decades have seen a flowering of empirical research and statistical methodologies. But that empirical revolution has severe growing pains — a replication crisis that has researchers in numerous fields questioning how much they should trust their colleagues’ results and taxpayers wondering how much wasted effort they should fund…
